name: K.L.E.A.N. INITIATIVE
description:
As leader of the K.L.E.A.N. Initiative your task is to make the first settlement on Earth after hundreds of years of it being uninhabited due to lethal amounts of pollution. For too long have we wandered the stars, it's time we made our return home!

Created by Doomed Minds:

- Jaime Ojeda (Artstation)

- Omar Said (Portfolio)

External Assets:

- Skybox in Main Menu by "PULSAR BYTE" link to page

- Sound effects from freesound
